name: Prosus N.V.
description: Prosus N.V. is a global consumer internet group and one of the largest technology investors in the world. Founded in 2019 as a spin-off from Naspers Limited, Prosus focuses on investing in and building leading consumer internet companies across various sectors. The company operates in more than 80 countries and has a strong presence in online classifieds, food delivery, fintech, and e-commerce, with notable investments in companies like Tencent, Delivery Hero, and OLX Group. Prosus aims to leverage its extensive portfolio and expertise to foster innovation and drive growth in the digital economy. With a vision to enhance the lives of millions through technology, Prosus is committed to sustainable and responsible investing, prioritizing long-term value creation. The company also actively supports initiatives that promote digital literacy and entrepreneurship in emerging markets. Prosus is listed on the Amsterdam Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the AEX index, providing investors with a unique opportunity to gain exposure to the rapidly evolving technology landscape.

seo.meta_title: Prosus N.V. | Leading Global Consumer Internet Group
seo.meta_description: Explore Prosus N.V., a leading global consumer internet group and major technology investor with a diverse portfolio across various sectors.

faq.question: What is Prosus known for?
faq.answer: Prosus is known for its investments in leading consumer internet companies and its involvement in various technology sectors.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Prosus?
faq.answer: Bob van Dijk is the CEO of Prosus N.V.

faq.question: Where is Prosus headquartered?
faq.answer: Prosus is headquartered in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

faq.question: What are the main sectors Prosus operates in?
faq.answer: Prosus operates in sectors such as e-commerce, fintech, food delivery, and online classifieds.
